Text:
So good you CHECKED in mkvmerge the option:
http://www.imagebam.com/image/1bdbe2125434459

You'll find a lot of people on internet complaining about that option unchecked.
In Mediainfo is showed as:
Muxing mode : Header stripping

Otherwise... great encodes. 10x!

Thanks for pointing that thing out LaVella.
However, the errors you may receive are from outdated or shitty players, it's not really mkvmerge's fault.
andr3iu daca mai urci in continuare, lasa info-ul intact, nu mai pune cacaturile debitate de tine.
